flyer.aerial: This map uses a different background, namely aerial imagery by Agentschap Informatie Vlaanderen
flyer.cyclofix: Bicycle pumps, repair stations, drinking water and cycle shops are on CycloFix
flyer.description: An A4-landscape flyer to promote MapComplete

editing.ex: A simplified example of what this looks like for a nature reserve is shown below.
editing.intro: The user is greeted by a map with features. Upon selecting one, the information about that feature is shown.
editing.title: What does the interface look like?

flyer.examples:
There are many thematic maps available of which a few are shown here.

There are many more thematic maps online: about healthcare, indoor navigation, wheelchair accessibility, waste facilities, public bookcases, pedestrian crossings with a rainbow-painting, … Discover them all on mapcomplete.org

fakeui.add_images: Add images with a few clicks
fakeui.attributes: Shows attributes in a friendly way
fakeui.edit: Wrong or outdated info? The edit button is right there.
fakeui.question: If an attribute is not yet known, MapComplete shows a question
fakeui.see_images: Shows images from previous contributors, Wikipedia, Mapillary, …

flyer.frontParagraph:
MapComplete is an easy to use web application to collect geodata in OpenStreetMap, enabling collecting and managing relevant data in an open, crowdsourced and reusable way.

New categories and attributes can be added upon request.
flyer.lines_too: Lines and polygons are shown too. Attributes and images can be added and updated on those objects as well.

mapcomplete.customize:
MapComplete can be tailored to your needs, with new map layers, new functionalities or styled with your organisation's colours and font.
We also have experience with starting campaigns to crowdsource geodata.
Contact pietervdvn@posteo.net for a quote.
mapcomplete.intro: MapComplete is a website which has {mapCount} interactive maps. Every single map allows to add or update information. It has many features:
mapcomplete.li1: Add new points and update info on existing ones
mapcomplete.li2: Add contact information and opening hours easily
mapcomplete.li3: Can be placed in other websites as iFrame
mapcomplete.li4: Embedded within the OpenStreetMap-ecosystem, which has many tools available
mapcomplete.li6: Many advanced features, such as tree detection and advanced input methods
mapcomplete.li7: Copylefted libre software (GPL licensed) and gratis to use
mapcomplete.title: What is MapComplete?

flyer.onwheels: Indoor maps for wheelchair users are available as well.
flyer.osm:
OpenStreetMap is an online map which can be edited and reused by anyone for any purpose as long as attribution is given and the data is kept open.

It is the biggest geospatial database in the world and is reused by thousands of applications and websites.
flyer.title: mapcomplete.org
flyer.toerisme_vlaanderen: For a joint project with Visit Flanders, 'Pin your point' was created. Over 160 contributors added a few thousand benches and picnic tables, and spotted 100 charging stations for bicycles.

general.about: Easily edit and add OpenStreetMap for a certain theme

aboutMapComplete.intro: Use MapComplete to add OpenStreetMap info on a single theme. Answer questions, and within minutes your contributions are available everywhere. In most themes you can add pictures or even leave a review. The theme maintainer defines elements, questions and languages for it.

add.disableFiltersExplanation: Some features might be hidden by a filter
add.hasBeenImported: This feature has already been imported

import.howToTest: To test, add test=true or backend=osm-test to the URL. The changeset will be printed in the console. Please open a PR to officialize this theme to actually enable the import button.
import.officialThemesOnly: The import button is disabled for unofficial themes to prevent accidents
import.wrongType: This feature is not a node or a way and can not be imported
import.wrongTypeToConflate: This feature is not a node or a way and can not be conflated
import.zoomInMore: Zoom in more to import this feature

add.stillLoading: The data is still loading. Please wait a bit before you add a new feature.
add.title: Add a new feature
add.wrongType: This feature is not a node or a way and can not be imported
add.zoomInFurther: You need to first zoom in further if you want to add a feature

download.licenseInfo:
Copyright notice

The provided data is available under ODbL. Reusing it is gratis for any purpose, but
  • the attribution © OpenStreetMap contributors must be shown
  • Any change must be published under the same license
Please read the full copyright notice for details.

sharescreen.embedIntro:
Embed on your website

Please, embed this map into your website.
We encourage you to do it - you don't even have to ask permission.
It is free, and always will be. The more people are using this, the more valuable it becomes.

hotkeyDocumentation.selectItem2: Select the POI which is second closest element to the map center (crosshair). Only when in keyboard navigation is used
hotkeyDocumentation.selectItem3: Select the POI which is third closest element to the map center (crosshair). Only when in keyboard navigation is used
hotkeyDocumentation.selectItemI: Select the POI which is the {i}th closest element to the map center (crosshair). Only when in keyboard navigation is used
hotkeyDocumentation.selectMap: Set the background to a map from external sources. Toggles between the two best, available layers
hotkeyDocumentation.selectOsmbasedmap: Set the background layer to on OpenStreetMap-based map (or disable the background raster layer)
hotkeyDocumentation.selectSearch: Select the search bar to search locations

plantDetection.button: Automatically detect the plant species using the AI of Plantnet.org

plantDetection.overviewVerify: Please verify that correct species and link it to the tree

preset_type.question: Of what type is this object?

privacy.editingIntro: When you make a change to the map, this change is recorded on OpenStreetMap and is publicly available to anyone. A changeset made with MapComplete includes the following data:
privacy.editingOutro: Please refer to the privacy policy on OpenStreetMap.org for detailed information. We'd like to remind you that you can use a fictional name when signing up.
privacy.geodata: When MapComplete gets your geolocation, your geolocation and previously visited locations stay on your device. Your location data is never automatically sent to anywhere else - unless some functionality clearly states otherwise.
privacy.intro: Privacy is important - for both the individual and for society. MapComplete tries to respect your privacy as much as possible - up to the point no annoying cookie banner is needed. However, we still would like to inform you which information is gathered and shared, under which circumstances and why these trade-offs are made.

items.distanceIndicator: An indication of how close you were to changed objects. Other mappers can use this information to determine if a change was made based on survey or on remote research
items.language: The language of the user interface
items.theme: The theme you used while making the change

privacy.miscCookies: MapComplete integrates with various other services, especially to load images of features. Images are hosted on various third-party servers, which might set cookies on their own.
privacy.surveillance: As you are reading the privacy policy, you probably care about privacy - so do we! We even made a theme showing surveillance cameras. Feel free to map them all!
privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.tracking: To gather some insight in whom visits our website, some technical information is collected. This is included the country you visited the webpage from, which website referred you to MapComplete, the type of your device and the screensize. A cookie is placed on your device to indicate that you visited MapComplete earlier today. This data is not detailed enough to personally identify you. These statistics are only available to anyone in aggregate and are publicly available to anyone

reviews.i_am_affiliated: I am affiliated with this object
reviews.i_am_affiliated_explanation: Check if you are an owner, creator, employee, …
reviews.no_reviews_yet: There are no reviews yet. Be the first one!

reviews.tos: If you create a review, you agree to the TOS and privacy policy of Mangrove.reviews
reviews.your_reviews_empty: We couldn't find any of your previous reviews
